CustomField.formula: IF( Aloha_Kitchen__c, "Aloha Kitchen;", "")+ IF(Existing_App_PMS__c, "PMS;","") + IF(CSO1__c, "CSO1 (iPad Kiosk);","") + IF(Existing_App_Pulse__c , "Pulse;","")+ IF(Existing_App_Consumer_Marketing__c, "Consumer Marketing;","") + IF(ExistingApplications_Command_Center__c, "Command Center;","") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ExistingApplications_Other__c)),(ExistingApplications_Other__c)+';','') + IF(OrderPoint__c, "OrderPoint;","") + IF(Amob_Orderman__c , "AMob Orderman;","")+IF(Legacy_Delivery__c, "Legacy Delivery;","")+IF(CSO2__c, "CSO2 (Kiosk);","") +IF(ExistingApplications_MobilePay__c , "Mobile Pay;","")+IF(ExistingApplications_BSP_APIs__c, "BSP APIs;","")+IF(FPS_Biometrics__c, "FPS/Biometrics;","")+IF(Amob_iOS__c, "AMob iOS ;","")+IF(Legacy_Loyalty_Freq_Buyer__c, "Legacy Loyalty Freq Buyer;","")+IF(Display_Boards__c, "Display Boards;","") +IF(ExistingApplication_Configuration_Center__c, "Configuration Center;","")+IF(ExistingApplications_ASV__c, "ASV;","")+IF(Customer_Voice__c, "Customer Voice;","")+IF(NBO__c, "NBO;","")+IF(AOO_DO_Conversion__c, "AOO/DO Conversion;","")+IF(ExistingApplications_Console__c, "Console;","")+IF(Existing_App_None__c,"None;","")+IF(ExistingApplications_Insight__c, "Insight;","")+IF(Guest_Manager__c, "Guest Manager;","")+IF(Gift_Cert_Manager__c, "Gift Cert Manager;","")+IF(Aloha_Restore__c, "Aloha Restore;","")+IF(ExistingApplications_NCR_Loyalty__c, "NCR Loyalty;","")+IF(Secure_Access__c, "Secure Access;","")+IF(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(ATO1__c))),TEXT(ATO1__c)+';','')+IF(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(NSS_Type__c))),TEXT(NSS_Type__c)+';','')+IF(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Existing_App_AOO_Type__c))),TEXT(Existing_App_AOO_Type__c)+';','')
CustomField.label: Existing Applications(Refresh and AddOn)
